import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Form(){ const data={ name:"", email:"", password:"", mobile:"", h:"", } const [inputData,setInputData]=useState(data) useEffect(()=>{ console.log("Registered") },[flag]) function handleData(e){ setInputData({...inputData ,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) console.log(inputData) } function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); if(!inputData.name || !inputData.email || !inputData.password){ alert("All fields are Mandatory") } } return(

Registration Form

Hobbies : Singing Badminton Reading Books
Gender: male female
) } export default Form;
